name: BunnyLoop
description:
BunnyLoop

BunnyLoop prototype, we glad finished on 17 min before end :3.

This is a simple game, the main goal is about collecting candy. the puzzle not very hard due to the deadline :3.
 -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Control : A/D => move left and right
Space => for jump

E => Back to position

Q =>  Slow-Mo

there is has some bug maybe after level 3
